input.sentences: some talented but twisted graffiti artist had painted a ominous looking figure on the tourist information sign .
get a map or find the graffiti artist cause he 'd be glad to tell you where to go .
output.sentences: Hoping no one would see the new street art she looked around for an escape.
She jumped on the nearest double decker bus.
The bus stopped at the station and she searched for a way to escape.
If she didn't escape she would have to go the police station.
But she found somewhere on the map to hide.
